headline: Polish film posters!
annotation: Insanely awesome film posters that are so much better than anything AI could produce. Highly recommended for anyone enjoying visual arts.

headline: The Zizians
annotation: Do you know who they were? Nor did we. But once you read this, you will know! There must be a film coming at some point… there must be.

headline: Weirdest and worst novelty songs ever
annotation: A TV channel with… unexpected... music.

headline: Mikko Linsiö - photographer
annotation: One of our photography heros. Amazing live photographs and awesome dude.

headline: Girl at the Rock Shows
annotation: One of our favourite indie music blogs from the US, someone we got to know doing media for our releases.

headline: The Graveyard Shift radio show
annotation: The Cremator has the deepest voice in radio and is the nicest scary guy we know. The world needs more radio like this!
